title: "Harper's Weekly" somewhat clunky serif titling caps
content:
ive seen it a million times ....is it a goudy font ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/whatsthisfont0001_6499.1.jpg)

 [‹ Schella Kann's logo type??](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41699 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old handwriting ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41691 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Pogo

comments.content: Clunky indeed. This doesn’t exactly look like a “professional” design, unless it’s a faithful revival of a vintage/historic face.
ahh it looks like Cloister ! only more clumsy

All - any ideas about a current match for the historic version of this face? (The “Harper’s Weekly” type.)

Thanks much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203221544im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/civil-war-mast-news_5903.jpg)
